Subskills.name: Hail Force
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by flash freeze.

Subskills.name: Excess Cold
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of icicles unleashed by frost orb.

Subskills.name: Icicle Bombardment
Subskills.description: Frost orb now unleashes icicles with every hit.

Subskills.name: Precise Tundra
Subskills.description: Increases attack rating when using flash freeze.

Subskills.name: Fractured Ice
Subskills.description: Chance for icicles to fork on hit.

Subskills.name: Nordic Frenzy
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to frozen targets.

Subskills.name: Boreal Reach
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of flash freeze.

Subskills.name: Freezing Rage
Subskills.description: Gain a stack of freezing rage on hit increasing your damage and attack speed.

Subskills.name: Coldflash Volley
Subskills.description: Unleash multiple icicles in an arc dealing increased damage and inflicting cold break. Does not require hitting a monster.

Subskills.name: Gelid Sequence
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of bounces for flash freeze.

Subskills.name: Eternal Cascade
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash another frost orb when it expires.

Subskills.name: Froststep
Subskills.description: Decreases movement diminish when using flash freeze.

Subskills.name: Recurving Stalactites
Subskills.description: Icicles from frost orb return to target location after a short duration dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Swirling Wintershard
Subskills.description: Frost orb now orbits you for a short duration frequently unleashing icicles.
